name: Irelia
title: the Blade Dancer
lore: The Noxian occupation of Ionia produced many heroes, none more unlikely than young Irelia of Navori. Trained in the ancient dances of her province, she adapted her art for war, using the graceful and carefully practised movements to levitate a host of deadly blades. After proving herself as a fighter, she was thrust into the role of resistance leader and figurehead, and to this day remains dedicated to the preservation of her homeland.
blurb: The Noxian occupation of Ionia produced many heroes, none more unlikely than young Irelia of Navori. Trained in the ancient dances of her province, she adapted her art for war, using the graceful and carefully practised movements to levitate a host of...
allytips: Use Bladesurge to cover great distances by targeting low life minions on your way to champion targets.
Defiant Dance is not interrupted by crowd control, try timing it for incoming disables.
Flawless Duet does not have a maximum travel distance, try using it in creative ways.
enemytips: Pay attention to Ionian Fervor stacks and try to engage Irelia when it is down.
Minion waves greatly enhance Irelia's mobility, beware fighting her inside one.
Beware of wasting your high impact spells on Defiant Dance.

riot_spells.name: Bladesurge
riot_spells.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Irelia dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ championdamage }} physical damage, applying on-hit effects and healing for {{ healamount }} health.

Bladesurge's cooldown is reset if the target was Marked or dies to Bladesurge.

Bladesurge deals {{ miniondamage }} damage to minions.

riot_spells.name: Defiant Dance
riot_spells.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.
riot_spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Irelia aligns her blades into a defensive formation, gaining {{ finalphysicaldr }}% physical damage reduction, but she is unable to act while holding her formation.

Second Cast: Irelia swipes her blades, dealing {{ mindamagecalc }} physical damage. Damage increases with charge time, up to {{ maxdamagecalc }} after {{ chargetimeformax }} seconds.

Defiant Dance cannot be interrupted.

riot_spells.name: Flawless Duet
riot_spells.description: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Irelia readies 2 blades that will fly towards each other once placed, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and stunning for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

Champions and large monsters are Marked for {{ markduration }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Vanguard's Edge
riot_spells.description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Irelia launches a storm of blades that explode outward upon hitting a champion. The blades deal {{ missiledamage }} magic damage and Mark champions and large monsters for {{ markduration }} seconds.

Irelia then forms the blades into a wall for {{ zoneduration }} seconds. Passing through the wall deals {{ zonedamage }} magic damage and slows by {{ slowamount }}% for {{ ccduration }} seconds.

riot_passive.name: Ionian Fervor
riot_passive.description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

i1.name: Ionian Fervor
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Irelia''' gains 1 ''Ionian Fervor'' stack for every enemy [[champion]] hit by her [[Champion ability|abilities]], or if she hits at least one non-champion, stacking up to 5 times. ''Ionian Fervor'' lasts for 6 seconds, with basic attacks against champions and large and epic [[monsters]] refreshing the duration.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Ionian Fervor:}} '''Irelia''' gains {{as|{{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|8 to 12|1;7;13}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} per stack, up to {{as|{{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|8*5 to 12*5|1;7;13}}|attack speed}}.
i1.description3: At maximum stacks, '''Irelia's''' basic attacks deal {{as|{{pp|15 to 66}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} on-hit.

q1.name: Bladesurge
q1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Enemy champions and large monsters hit by {{ai|Flawless Duet|Irelia}} and {{ais|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}} initial barrage are {{as|marked|buzzword}} for 5 seconds, consumed with ''Bladesurge''.
q1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' {{tip|dashes}} through the target enemy, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}, applying [[on-hit effect]]s and {{tip|healing}} herself. ''Bladesurge'' deals increased damage to {{tip|minions}}.
q1.leveling2:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|5 to 85}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}|Minion Bonus Damage|{{ap|55 to 135}}|Minion Total Damage|{{ap|5+55 to 85+135}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}}}
{{st|Heal|{{as|{{ap|12 to 20}}% AD}}}}
q1.description3: ''Bladesurge's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is refunded if the target was {{as|marked|buzzword}} or if it dies to or after ''Bladesurge'' has been cast.
q1.notes:
* ''Bladesurge'' will only allow '''Irelia''' to dash through walls if there is enough space for her on the other side.
* ''Bladesurge's'' dash speed is unaffected by {{tip|slow|slows}}.
* Damage is not dealt to the target if ''Irelia'' is disrupted before she reaches their location.
** But the damage cannot be dodged via instant displacement ({{ai|Urchin Strike|Fizz}}).
** If the target dies within a very short time (~{{fd|0.5}} seconds) of performing ''Bladesurge'', its cooldown will still refresh.

w1.name: Defiant Dance
w1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Irelia''' {{ct|windup|winds up|cast=false|items=false|move=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets|spells=true,false,false,false,recasts|interrupts=death}} for up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which she reduces incoming {{as|physical damage}} by 50% {{as|(+ 7% per 100 AP)}}.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Second Cast:}} After a {{fd|0.07}}-second delay, '''Irelia''' swipes with her blades in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies around her and in a line, increased by {{pp|11|key=%|type=channel time|0 to 100|0 to 0.75|formula=10% per 0.075 seconds. ''This is capped at 0.75 seconds.''}}.
w1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|10 to 70}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 70*2}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
w1.description3: The {{sbc|Second Cast}} activates automatically toward the cursor's direction at the end of the duration.
w1.notes:
* Quick Casting utilizes hold-and-release for the two casts.
* ''Defiant Dance'' reaches 100% physical damage reduction at {{as|{{fd|714.29}} AP}}.

e1.name: Flawless Duet
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' sends a blade to the target location for up to {{fd|3.5}} seconds. After a {{fd|0.35}}-second delay, ''Flawless Duet'' may be recast to send another blade out, and does so automatically at '''Irelia's''' position if the first blade would expire, though not if she is {{tip|mute|muted}} or channeling {{ai|Defiant Dance|Irelia}} or {{si|Teleport}}.
e1.description2: Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other after a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} all enemies struck for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after converging.
e1.notes:
* '''Irelia''' can launch the second blade even if {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
* {{ii|Sheen}} will proc on both casts.
* The blades will not stun or deal damage if they do not converge (i.e {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}).

r1.name: Vanguard's Edge
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' launches a barrage of blades through a wide line in the target direction, exploding outwards upon hitting a [[champion]], dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck.
r1.description2: The blades form into a spade-shaped perimeter around the explosion for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, knocking aside all enemies, though not rendering them {{tip|airborne}}. Enemies that pass through the blades are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
r1.notes: * Enemies that cross the perimeter are '''not''' {{as|marked|buzzword}} for {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}.
